title: Breakingviews TV: Gun recoil
text:
Breakingviews TV: Gun recoil 11:15pm IST - 04:16 
Consumers and companies are turning up the pressure on gun manufacturers in the wake of this month’s Florida shooting. Rob Cox talks with John Foley about where the backlash goes next, and how financial investors might scrutinize their own portfolios.   
Consumers and companies are turning up the pressure on gun manufacturers in the wake of this month’s Florida shooting. Rob Cox talks with John Foley about where the backlash goes next, and how financial investors might scrutinize their own portfolios.  //reut.rs/2CNpQ1y
